## Overall Quality Score
**Score: 4/5**

The overall quality of the manuscript is very good, but it falls short in a few areas. The main strength of this paper is that it provides a clear and well-organized overview of the current state-of-the-art algorithms for stochastic optimization. The authors provide an excellent summary of the recent advances in the area, and their comparison on various benchmarks. This work can be used as a reference by practitioners who are interested in using these algorithms. However, there is still room to improve this paper.

The writing in this manuscript is very clear. The authors provide an excellent summary of the current state-of-the-art stochastic optimization algorithms and their comparison on various benchmarks. The writing is easy to follow, and it does not require any prior knowledge about the subject matter.
